product_overview.one_sentence_pitch: Boards empowers sales and marketing professionals to instantly access and share organized, on-brand content directly from their mobile keyboard across any messaging or social app.

target_users.persona_summary: I'm a sales or marketing rep, often communicating with prospects and customers on social media or messaging apps, needing quick access to accurate product info, scripts, and media.
jobs_to_be_done: Respond quickly to customer inquiries with accurate information.
Share product catalogs, videos, and testimonials easily.
Maintain consistent brand messaging across all interactions.
Reduce time spent searching for content.
key_pains: Slow response times due to searching for content.
Inconsistent messaging from different team members.
Difficulty sharing rich media (images, videos, PDFs) quickly on mobile.
Losing potential sales opportunities due to delayed or incomplete information.
key_desires: To be perceived as highly responsive and professional.
To close deals faster and more efficiently.
To have all necessary sales/marketing assets at their fingertips.
To feel empowered and organized in their daily customer interactions.

target_users.persona_summary: I manage a team of sales or marketing professionals and need to ensure message quality, team efficiency, and a streamlined sales cycle.
jobs_to_be_done: Ensure consistent messaging and quality across the team.
Speed up the overall sales cycle.
Onboard new team members quickly with access to approved content.
Distribute new marketing collateral or sales promotions to the team instantly.
key_pains: Inconsistent brand messaging from individual team members.
Slow team adoption of new marketing materials or sales strategies.
Lack of visibility into what content is being used.
Inefficient content distribution and updates for the team.
key_desires: To achieve higher team performance and sales targets.
To maintain brand integrity and quality in all customer interactions.
To foster a highly collaborative and efficient team environment.
To reduce training time for new hires on content usage.

core_value_props.name: Instant Content Access
core_value_props.description: Access all your sales and marketing content (scripts, images, videos, PDFs, links) directly from your phone's keyboard.
core_value_props.why_it_mattered: Eliminates time wasted searching for information, allowing for immediate, informed responses that can close deals faster and improve customer experience.

core_value_props.name: Universal Messaging Integration
core_value_props.description: Works across all major messaging and social media apps (WhatsApp, Messenger, Instagram, TikTok, etc.).
core_value_props.why_it_mattered: Provides seamless access to content wherever customer conversations happen, ensuring consistency and professionalism regardless of the platform.

core_value_props.name: Centralized Team Content Management
core_value_props.description: Managers can create, organize, and update content boards, which sync in real-time across all team members' devices.
core_value_props.why_it_mattered: Ensures brand consistency, improves team efficiency, speeds up the sales cycle, and simplifies onboarding by providing a single source of truth for all sales and marketing assets.

core_value_props.name: Organized Content Structure
core_value_props.description: Content can be organized into boards and sub-folders, just like structuring a business.
core_value_props.why_it_mattered: Makes large volumes of content manageable and easy to navigate, allowing users to find exactly what they need quickly and intuitively.

aha_moments.description: Introduction of the core concept: marketing/sales content directly in the phone's keyboard.
aha_moments.user_reaction_hypothesis: Ah, this solves the 'always searching' problem! I can have all my content here.

aha_moments.description: Demonstration of inserting a 'Product Catalog' into a chat from the keyboard.
aha_moments.user_reaction_hypothesis: Wow, that's so fast! No more copying and pasting or navigating away.

aha_moments.description: Visual showing compatibility with numerous messaging/social apps (Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, etc.).
aha_moments.user_reaction_hypothesis: It works everywhere I talk to customers! This is truly integrated.

aha_moments.description: User switches to Boards keyboard, navigates to 'Make-up Board', accesses 'FAQs' folder, and inserts a pre-written response.
aha_moments.user_reaction_hypothesis: This is incredibly fast and efficient for answering common questions. So much time saved!

aha_moments.description: User attaches an image and a video from the Boards keyboard into the chat.
aha_moments.user_reaction_hypothesis: Not just text, but rich media too! This makes my responses so much more engaging and complete.

aha_moments.description: Demonstration of sharing a content board with other team members via email or invite link.
aha_moments.user_reaction_hypothesis: Great for team collaboration! We can all share the same approved content.

aha_moments.description: Visual representation of content syncing across mobile and desktop devices for multiple team members in real-time.
aha_moments.user_reaction_hypothesis: Seamless collaboration and consistency. Everyone is always on the same page with the latest content.

aha_moments.description: Manager sends a 'New Promotion Update' announcement to the entire team, appearing as a mobile notification.
aha_moments.user_reaction_hypothesis: Finally, a way to ensure my team gets critical updates instantly and consistently. No more excuses for outdated info.

friction_points.description: Initial intro screen with just the product name 'Boards'.
friction_points.ad_editing_suggestion: Cut or speed up significantly. Start directly with the problem or the core concept.

friction_points.description: Showing the app download and sign-up process.
friction_points.ad_editing_suggestion: Condense to a quick flash or montage of download/install icons. This is standard and not a unique selling point.

friction_points.description: Detailed step-by-step creation of a board, including naming and emoji selection.
friction_points.ad_editing_suggestion: Speed up this segment or use quick cuts to show the *result* of organization rather than the *process* of inputting each item.

friction_points.description: Screen showing 'All your boards will appear here' is purely informational UI.
friction_points.ad_editing_suggestion: Cut this short or integrate it quickly with a shot showing many boards already created.

friction_points.description: Highlighting 'robust editing' and 'larger scale boards' on desktop, but the visual just shows a static desktop app.
friction_points.ad_editing_suggestion: If this is a key differentiator, show actual robust editing or a complex board being managed on desktop. Otherwise, simplify or cut.

usage_contexts: Responding to customer inquiries on social media (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok).
Chatting with prospects on messaging apps (WhatsApp, Messenger, Telegram).
Sending product information and media via LinkedIn messages.
Onboarding new sales or marketing team members.
Distributing new marketing campaigns or sales promotions to a team.
Managing and organizing sales and marketing collateral for personal or team use.

fantasies: I'm the most responsive and knowledgeable person on my team, always having the perfect answer ready.
My sales cycle is dramatically shorter because I can provide all necessary information instantly.
My entire sales and marketing team operates like a well-oiled machine, always on message and perfectly aligned.
I can scale my personalized outreach without sacrificing quality or speed, making every customer feel valued.
I'm a cutting-edge professional, leveraging the latest tech to outperform competitors and grow my business.
confirmation_lines: I can finally say I am always prepared for any customer question.
By using Boards, I ensure my team communicates with consistent excellence.
I'm no longer wasting time searching; I'm spending it selling and connecting.
My customer interactions are now seamless and impactful.
I've streamlined my entire content workflow, empowering my team to achieve more.

differentiation_hypotheses: Most content management solutions are desktop-centric or lack deep mobile keyboard integration for instant, in-app sharing.
Unlike generic mobile keyboards, Boards is specifically designed for sales and marketing content, offering robust organization and team collaboration features.
The real-time syncing and update notification system for teams provides a level of content control and alignment often missing in ad-hoc mobile sharing methods.

ad_angle_ideas.core_promise: Never miss a beat or a sale. Get instant access to all your sales content right from your keyboard.
suggested_formats: Fast-paced POV montage of a salesperson quickly responding to multiple chats with Boards.

ad_angle_ideas.core_promise: Empower your entire team with consistent, on-brand content, ensuring quality and efficiency at scale.
suggested_formats: Screen recording walkthrough focusing on team features (sharing, updates) with manager voiceover.

ad_angle_ideas.core_promise: Transform your phone into a powerful sales and marketing hub, keeping all your essential content one tap away.
suggested_formats: Lifestyle shots of a busy professional using Boards on the go, seamlessly integrated into their day.

research_goals_for_agent: Identify common pain points for sales and marketing professionals regarding mobile content access and sharing.
Find examples of successful mobile-first productivity tool ads, especially those leveraging in-app keyboard functionality.
Research effective ad strategies for B2B SaaS tools targeting sales and marketing teams.
Look for competitor analysis on similar 'content keyboard' or 'sales enablement' apps and their marketing angles.
Gather insights on the most impactful messaging for improving team efficiency and sales cycle speed.
research_queries_for_agent: mobile sales enablement tools marketing strategy
best practices for B2B mobile app ads
sales team content sharing pain points
how to improve sales response time mobile
ads for productivity apps with keyboard integration
content management for direct sellers social media
risks_and_constraints: Ads must not overstate the AI capabilities; content is manually curated.
The product requires initial setup (creating boards, adding content) which might be a barrier; ads should manage expectations around this.
Ensure ads clearly communicate the 'keyboard' aspect to avoid confusion with standard content management systems.
Avoid implying that Boards replaces CRM or full sales automation tools; it's a content access layer.
Do not promise guaranteed sales increases, but focus on the enablement for faster, more effective communication.
